mapper.update: update order_info set pay_status='2' where order_id=#{orderId}
mapper.select:
select order_id from order_info
pay_type_id=#{quoteId} and pay_status='0' or pay_status='1'

select t1.account_id as accountId, (t1.invite_code_level-level)+1 as level, t1.invite_code_level, t1.level as p_level, q.biz_total, c.car_number, c.frame_number, o.*, d.status as cash_status, per.biz_percentage, per.force_percentage, per.level_one, per.level_two from (select account_id, invite_code_level, (select invite_code_level from account_info where account_id=#{createBy} ) as level from account_info where FIND_IN_SET(account_id,getAccountInfoChildList(#{createBy},2))) t1 INNER JOIN order_info o ON o.create_by = t1.account_id INNER JOIN quote_info q on q.quote_id =o.pay_type_id INNER JOIN car_info c on q.car_info_id= c.car_info_id LEFT JOIN draw_cash d ON d.order_id=o.order_id INNER JOIN commission_percentage per ON per.id=d.commission_percentage_id ;
